data.eml:eml: Battle of two replacement names for the genus Metagonia Kolbe, 1899 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lacroix, Marc, K, Aleš Bezd Ě (2009): Battle of two replacement names for the genus Metagonia Kolbe, 1899 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae). Zootaxa 2237: 67-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190460
